title: '[FEATURE] '

---

## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Use Case

Describe the problem this feature would solve or the use case it would enable.

**Example:**
- "I need to ingest data from [Source] but there's no connector"
- "I want to [action] but the current implementation doesn't support it"
- "This would make it easier to [workflow]"

## Proposed Solution

How you envision this feature working:

- Configuration changes needed
- New connectors/plugins required
- API changes (if any)

## Alternatives Considered

Other solutions or workarounds you've considered.

## Priority

- [ ] High - Blocking my use case
- [ ] Medium - Would significantly improve workflow
- [ ] Low - Nice to have

## Additional Context

- Related issues or discussions
- Examples from other tools
- Mockups or diagrams (if applicable)

## Implementation Notes (Optional)

If you're planning to implement this yourself:
- Technical approach
- Estimated effort
- Questions for maintainers
